Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Highly expressed in spleen, and expressed at lower levels in intestin and lung.

Literature.Title: Defensins and the convergent evolution of platypus and reptile venom genes.
Literature.Author: Whittington CM, Papenfuss AT, Bansal P, Torres AM, Wong ES, Deakin JE, Graves T, Alsop A, Schatzkamer K, Kremitzki C, Ponting CP, Temple-Smith P, Warren WC, Kuchel PW, Belov K.

Literature.Title: Expression patterns of platypus defensin and related venom genes across a range of tissue types reveal the possibility of broader functions for OvDLPs than previously suspected.
Literature.Author: Whittington CM, Papenfuss AT, Kuchel PW, Belov K.
